subject: Talking fish
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Told Skepbitch about this one, she say it just coincidence. Guess that's
the standard answer. I do a video of frying fish while holding a ghost box
and a voice over the radio just happens to talk about fish talking, just how
common would that be, and what's the chances of catching that at that
moment?--Skeptic idiots! Yeah, that'll make this go away.

 I was thinking about the fish talking, but I said nothing.

F-S

Told Skepbi ch abou his one, she say i jus coincidence. Guess ha 's he s anda d answe . I do a ideo o ying ish while holding a ghos box and a oice o e he adio jus happens o alk abou ish alking, jus how common would ha be, and wha 's he chances o ca ching ha a ha momen ?--Skep ic idio s! Yeah, ha 'll make his go away.

 
 I was hinking abou he ish alking, bu I said no hing.
